content.rendered:
We have a mat area of 64m2 set up which, on request, can be covered/stacked to allow the space to be utilised in a different way.

It is ideally set up for any martial art looking for a training location.

A studio gym is included with the club, and can be used if you are looking at starting up as a personal trainer, looking for a new location, or use the whole area for weather proof boot-camps.

The utilities include a kitchenette, shower and toilet. Lots of free street parking close by.

Sublet pricing estimates

$40 per hour

$100 per day (7am – 5pm)

$350 per week (Monday – Friday, 7am – 5pm)

***Sublet price will vary depending on usage and negotiable***
